thread.title: Troubled Monte dei Paschi surprises with swing to Q1 profit

title: Troubled Monte dei Paschi surprises with swing to Q1 profit
text:
Troubled Monte dei Paschi surprises with swing to Q1 profit Friday, May 11, 2018 - 01:39
Shares in Italy's troubled lender, Monte dei Paschi, jump ten per cent in early trade as the bank reveals it's swung to profit in the first quarter, helped by cost cutting and lower loan losses. Silvia Antonioli reports.
